cz.zcu.kiv.dfs_simulator.model

Class ByteSize

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.zcu.kiv.dfs_simulator.model.ByteSize

  • public class ByteSize
extends java.lang.Object
    Representation of size. Allows conversion between multiples.

    • Property Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Type Property and Description
      javafx.beans.property.LongProperty bytes
      Returns a writable LongProperty with size in bytes.
      javafx.beans.property.DoubleProperty gigaBytes
      Returns a writable DoubleProperty with size in gigabytes.
      javafx.beans.property.StringProperty humanReadable
      Returns StringProperty with human readable representation.
      javafx.beans.property.DoubleProperty kiloBytes
      Returns a writable DoubleProperty with size in kilobytes.
      javafx.beans.property.DoubleProperty megaBytes
      Returns a writable DoubleProperty with size in megabytes.
